What time do you usually get up?
I try to get up as soon as possible.
But it is not easy to get up early every day.
Do you exercise in the morning?
No, I don't. What about you?
I always get up before 7 and jog in the park.
Wow. Is it possible for you to get up before 7 every day?
Sometimes it is not easy for me to get up early.
So I try to go to bed as early as I can.
Why don't you do some exercise in the morning?
Umm. It is hard for me to do exercise in the morning.
